page.title: 06Braybrooke Village
page.content: Braybrooke is a village with a population of about 350.The nearby towns and villages are Arthingworth, Oxendon,Desborough and Market Harborough.Braybrooke has a very friendly atmosphere and it is very peaceful.It sometimes has the odd car or two passing.Braybrooke has 1 pub,1 shop and post office.There is a bridge which is about 600 years old.Every year Braybrooke has a village Fete in Mrs. Underwood's garden sometime near the end of June.We have a church and a Sunday school.There are around 117 houses in the whole village.There are some castle ruins and the remains of the fish pond.The oldest building in the village is the church.The village school has around 70 children.There are 4 farms whose owners live in the village.
